column1: This file will be used to upload data to the NelsonDB. FIELD NAMES CAN BE ADDED, BUT SHOULD BE DONE SPARINGLY

column2: For recording information about a plate.

column7: Definition
The experiment name to which this plate is a part of.
A unique ID for the plate. Formats may vary, but this needs to be unique. MUST BE UNIQUE
The location name of where the plate is located.
A human readable name for the plate.
The date when the plate was plated. Format: 2015-01-30
The contents of the plate. Example: Tissue, DNA
The rep number of the plate.
The type of plate. Example: 96-well, Costar rack
A brief description of whether the plate exists or not.
Any additional comments about the plate.
Definition
The city, state, country, zipcode where the location is.
A descriptive name for the location. MUST BE UNIQUE
The building name. Example: Plant Science, Emerson
The room number or name
The shelf in which the plate is located. Example: 1, 2, 3
The column in which the plate is located. Example: A, B, C
The box which the plate is in.
Any additional comments about the location of the plate.

column2: For recording information about a locality.

column7: Definition
The locality's city name.
The locality's state.
The locality's country.
The locality's zipcode.
